channel.title: The American people
channel.description:
This series examines contemporary American issues through interviews and personal essays.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Surprise, surprise, part one
item.description: This program, the first of two parts, presents a study of the minds and feelings of American children.
item.dc:creator: WRVR (Radio station : New York, N.Y.)
item.dc:subject: United States--History--20th century

item.title: The good old days: A study in nostalgia, part one
item.description: This program, the first of two parts, uses interviews with various Americans to explore American nostalgia in the middle part of the twentieth century.
item.dc:creator: WRVR (Radio station : New York, N.Y.)
item.dc:subject: United States--History--20th century

item.title: The good old days: A study in nostalgia, part two
item.description: This program, the second of two parts, uses interviews with various Americans to explore American nostalgia in the middle part of the twentieth century.
item.dc:creator: WRVR (Radio station : New York, N.Y.)
item.dc:subject: United States--History--20th century

item.title: Surprise, surprise, part two
item.description: This program, the second of two parts, presents a study of the minds and feelings of American children.
item.dc:creator: WRVR (Radio station : New York, N.Y.)
item.dc:subject: United States--History--20th century

item.title: What is patriotism, part 1
item.description: This program, the first of two parts, uses interviews with various Americans to explore attitudes about patriotism in the middle part of the twentieth century.
item.dc:creator: WRVR (Radio station : New York, N.Y.)
item.dc:subject: United States--History--20th century

item.title: What is patriotism, part 2
item.description: This program, the second of two parts, uses interviews with various Americans to explore attitudes about patriotism in the middle part of the twentieth century.
item.dc:creator: WRVR (Radio station : New York, N.Y.)
item.dc:subject: United States--History--20th century
